chunk:
Happy 2nd Birthday Calming Creamy Cleanser

Brand: Happy 2nd Birthday

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sorbitol, Stearic Acid, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetyl Palmitate, Butyrospermum Parkii Nut Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ale

ojoba) Seed Oil, Aleurites Moluccana Seed Oil, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sorbitan Palmitate, Decyl Glucoside, Lauryl Glucoside, Maltodextrin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Xanthan Gum, Lactobacillus Ferment, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Allantoin, Sea Water, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Plantago Major Leaf Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Vanilla Plani

tract, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Phenethyl Alcohol, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Saccharide Isomerate

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
